1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing or using GlowPicked's website, mobile applications, or services (collectively, the "Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access the Service.

Important:

  • These terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and GlowPicked
  • We may update these terms from time to time with notice
  • Continued use of our Service after changes constitutes acceptance
  • You must be at least 13 years old to use our Service

2. Description of Service

GlowPicked is a website that provides product recommendations and recommendations for beauty and skincare products. Our services include:

ü§ñ Product Reviews

Automated analysis of beauty products using artificial intelligence, including ingredient analysis, user review synthesis, and performance scoring.

üìä Product Recommendations

Personalized product suggestions based on your preferences, skin type, concerns, and budget based on Amazon customer review research.

üìö Educational Content

Articles, guides, and educational materials about skincare ingredients, beauty trends, and product evaluation methodologies.

üîó Affiliate Links

Links to purchase recommended products from our retail partners, which may earn us a commission at no extra cost to you.

Service Limitations

Our Service is provided "as is" and we make no guarantees about:

  • Continuous availability or uptime
  • Accuracy of all product information or reviews
  • Compatibility with all devices or browsers
  • Individual results from recommended products

GlowPicked owns or licenses all intellectual property rights in our Service, including:

You represent that you own or have permission to submit any content you provide.

Copyright Infringement (DMCA)

We respect intellectual property rights. If you believe your copyrighted work has been infringed, please contact us with:

  • Description of the copyrighted work
  • Location of the allegedly infringing material

6. Affiliate Relationships & Commissions

How Affiliate Marketing Works

GlowPicked participates in affiliate marketing programs. This means:

  • We may earn commissions when you purchase products through our links
  • These commissions don't affect the price you pay
  • Our reviews and recommendations are independent of affiliate relationships
  • We clearly disclose all affiliate relationships

Our Promise

ü§ñ AI-First Reviews

We try to pick products based on quality, not commission rates.

üîç Transparent Disclosure

We clearly mark affiliate links and disclose our relationships with brands.

üìä Research-Based Decisions

We aim to recommend products based on customer reviews, not commissions.

üéØ Your Best Interest

We recommend products that research suggests are well-reviewed, not just profitable for us.

No Purchase Guarantee

We provide information to help you make decisions, but:

  • We don't guarantee you'll be satisfied with any purchase
  • Individual results may vary from our analysis
  • We're not responsible for merchant policies, shipping, or customer service
  • Product availability and pricing may change

AI Technology Limitations

Please understand:

  • Work in Progress: Our research methodology may have gaps

‚ö†Ô∏è Medical Disclaimer

GlowPicked is NOT a substitute for professional medical advice.

  • Our reviews are for informational purposes only
  • Consult a dermatologist for serious skin concerns
  • Discontinue use if you experience adverse reactions
  • We don't provide medical diagnoses or treatment advice
  • Individual skin reactions can vary significantly

Service Availability

We provide our Service "as is" and "as available" without warranties:

  • We don't guarantee continuous, uninterrupted access

8. Limitation of Liability

What We're Not Responsible For

To the fullest extent permitted by law, GlowPicked is not liable for:

  • Indirect Damages: Lost profits, data loss, or business interruption
  • Product Issues: Problems with products you purchase from third parties
  • Skin Reactions: Adverse reactions to products we review
  • Third Parties: Actions of affiliate partners or other websites
  • Technical Issues: Website downtime or technical problems
  • Data Loss: Loss of your account data or preferences

Damage Cap

Our total liability for any claim related to our Service is limited to:

  • $100 USD maximum per incident
  • The amount you paid us in the 12 months prior to the claim
  • Whichever is less

Legal Exceptions

Some jurisdictions don't allow certain liability limitations. If you're in such a jurisdiction, some of the above limitations may not apply to you.
